infos.desc1: Guangzhou JODO Tech Ltd. is committed to Publishing and Developing Game, E-Commerce, Application Software, Enterprise Services and other fields.
infos.desc2: From starting the game to the sea to multi-project, multi-service and multi-field parallel, JODO has covered the business in more than 70 countries around the world,
infos.desc3:
And continue to explore in more business areas. 
In the future, JODO is the leader and explorer of the Internet industry, will adhere to the "diversity, cooperation, win-win" business philosophy, is committed to becoming the world's leading Internet service provider.

year13.content1: JODO was formally established in September 2013
year13.title: year 2013

year16.content1: Without any financing plan, JODO grew and developed with its own profits. It got a pretty .commendable result in August 2016.

year17.content1: In August 2017, it won the Best Game Award of Ali Game Ecology Party.

year18.content1: In January 2018, the first self-developed & published mobile game Super Hospital was launched.

year19.content1: Identified as a technologically advanced service company in 2019
year19.content2: In January 2019, the self-developed & published game "Idle Cook" was recommended by Apple's Editor’s Choice
year19.content3: In 2019, it was appraised as a key cultivation enterprise of service trade in Guangzhou
year19.content4: Established Superera, a casual game publishing brand, in May 2019, expanding hundreds of global casual game developers

product.content1: The products are distributed at home and abroad, and currently have more than 10 mobile products with a total download volume of more than two million. The users cover more than 100 countries and regions and 5 mainstream language versions, most of which come from overseas markets mainly in Europe and America.
product.content2: Products include a series of mobile phone tool applications, such as CLEAN TOOL, CAMERAL, PHOTO EDITOR, etc., to provide more efficient, convenient and personalized mobile phone control experience for global users.
